segments.text: I see the woman standing at the sink, completely absorbed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so focused, yet I can’t help but notice the water pouring over the edge of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is growing larger, spreading rapidly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s as if she’s in a world of her own, blissfully unaware of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how she can be so oblivious to the overflowing water at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden looks so peaceful, contrasting sharply with the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the warmth of the sun coming through that wide window.
segments.speaker: PAR
